category.template: KYC is for authentication of Users in order to validate their credentials , and enable smooth interaction with the banking services, The documents required for KYC are specified by RBI , and Banks need to Follow the norms specified by RBI. In order to ease this process KnowYC provides a truely Online Customer On Boarding Experience without hassles.

KYC is for authentication of Users in order to validate their credentials , and enable smooth interaction with the banking services, The documents required for KYC are specified by RBI , and Banks need to Follow the norms specified by RBI.
